body_html: It might depend on your hyper-parameters. The tutorial model is not tuned and has a lot of data, so it would probably take months to fully converge. But you can tune it to converge faster, and it should get to reasonable perplexity in a few days anyway. Also, real-time is hard to jugde, can differ from machine to machine. What's your step number and perplexity -- that's the question to ask (and some step-number and perplexity ballpark are included in the tutorial).

body: It might depend on your hyper-parameters. The tutorial model is not tuned and has a lot of data, so it would probably take months to fully converge. But you can tune it to converge faster, and it should get to reasonable perplexity in a few days anyway. Also, real-time is hard to jugde, can differ from machine to machine. What's your step number and perplexity -- that's the question to ask (and some step-number and perplexity ballpark are included in the tutorial).
